external_games.name: Atelier Firis - Character: Shanon / 追加キャラクター『シャノン』

name: Atelier Firis: The Alchemist and the Mysterious Journey - Shanon
summary: With this DLC you will be able to interact with the new character Shanon and a new outfit will become available to use under the Change Outfit option inside the Atelier. *You need to progress the story to the certain point to add Shanon to your party.
